name: Take Flight (VillaVivace)
description:
This game is a work in progress! It was made by me, Dominic Villa (programming) and my partner, Ariana Lazich (art), as a final project in our intro game design course. We only had a couple of weeks to work on it. 

Take Flight was made in the Construct 3 engine, with limitations of the free version. I plan on remaking this game in GameMaker: Studio or Unity to allow for additional content, bug fixes, and a UI overhaul. 

Key Feature(s):

  • Play as a bird and experience mini-games based off their traits and lifestyles 
    • Great White Pelican- Fly over the sea and collect fish to take home. Beware of other greedy birds!
    • Calliope Hummingbird- Fly around and gather materials to build a cozy nest while keeping your stamina from falling to 0. Watch out for hazardous objects!
